a:5:{s:1:"d";O:8:"stdClass":15:{s:11:"category_id";s:3:"245";s:13:"category_type";s:6:"topics";s:9:"parent_id";s:1:"0";s:3:"uri";s:5:"india";s:13:"category_name";s:5:"India";s:11:"description";s:602:"<p>India is a founding member of the East Asia Summit and an active member of ERIA&rsquo;s research network in the region. India offers a sizeable market and demographic dividend to investors and enjoys a leading share in global trade in services. India influences and shapes the regional connectivity in the Indo-Pacific, across all the pillars - economic, security, and social-cultural. ASEAN-India connectivity is central to all connectivity plans in the region. ERIA works closely with the government and research networks in India on themes of economic integration and sustainable development.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:45:"/uploads/topics/istock-1209847110_300x200.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"880";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:0:"";s:16:"meta_description";s:0:"";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2020-09-17 17:25:49";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}s:1:"g";a:0:{}s:1:"e";O:8:"DateTime":3:{s:4:"date";s:26:"2023-02-22 04:19:35.918214";s:13:"timezone_type";i:3;s:8:"timezone";s:13:"Europe/Berlin";}s:1:"m";N;s:1:"c";N;}
